markdownRemark.html:
I really wish I had more time!


I wish to learn more physics!

I wish more time with my nanay!

I need to learn python!

I want to speak French and maybe German!

I want to increase my fluency in Spanish!

I want to go to Galapagos!

I want to write a book!

I want to code!

I want to learn how to play the guitar!

I want to spend more time with my future wife!
